# Orientation {-#orientation}

Below you will find links to some orientation videos to provide more context for the key requirements new students need to think about in their first year. These videos are intended for you as a reference, but if you want more clarification or have other questions be sure to ask. Click on the videos below or find them in the `\\FRST-IRSStor\Root\ByProject\Orientation\Orientation_Videos` folder.
